content:
- 'category-description': Allows the user to manage their inbox, including organizing,
    reading, and responding to emails.
  'id': 890e39813a2448849
  'category-name': Inbox Management
  'entity':
  - 'attribute-description': The action to perform on the emails.
    'id': 523b974721484d58b
    'attribute-name': action
  - 'attribute-description': The current status of the emails.
    'id': e7bc02c3aeb143389
    'attribute-name': email_status
  - 'attribute-description': The type of emails to manage.
    'id': 236d16fa40c248bc8
    'attribute-name': email_type
- 'category-description': Allows the user to manage their spam filter, including adjusting
    sensitivity and adding or removing addresses from the blocklist.
  'id': 77d3b22047684258a
  'category-name': Spam Filtering
  'entity':
  - 'attribute-description': The email service provider to apply spam filtering on.
    'id': 355f07e30c144d239
    'attribute-name': email_provider
  - 'attribute-description': The action to take when an email is marked as spam.
    'id': c25a44670cab49e28
    'attribute-name': spam_action
- 'category-description': This intent involves the unauthorized access and retrieval
    of sensitive information, often for malicious purposes.
  'id': 142180b9b9ba4fcf9
  'category-name': Data Breaches
  'entity':
  - 'attribute-description': The industry affected by the data breach.
    'id': e229415169844dbca
    'attribute-name': industry
    'attribute-similar-values':
    - retail
    - finance
    - healthcare
    - technology
  - 'attribute-description': The company that experienced the data breach.
    'id': cc297e3a44df46468
    'attribute-name': company
  - 'attribute-description': The type of data breached.
    'id': 49af9b2c57fa4cc98
    'attribute-name': type
  - 'attribute-description': The number of records affected by the data breach.
    'id': 41a1d5fadfd14959b
    'attribute-name': number_of_records
  - 'attribute-description': The year the data breach occurred.
    'id': 9d53874e25074b019
    'attribute-name': year
- 'category-description': Allows the user to view, manage, and respond to emails they
    have previously sent.
  'id': 7e48f650dc6341c49
  'category-name': Sent Mail Management
  'entity':
  - 'attribute-description': The status of the sent mail.
    'id': 90cb335a4d9742e9b
    'attribute-name': mail_status
  - 'attribute-description': The time period for the sent mail.
    'id': 192c24edd49a4cb19
    'attribute-name': time_period
  - 'attribute-description': The recipient of the sent mail.
    'id': 2f52ec6eacaf4b439
    'attribute-name': recipient
  - 'attribute-description': The criteria to sort the sent mail.
    'id': 41dbc3c5e76548fc9
    'attribute-name': sort_by
    'attribute-similar-values':
    - date
    - sender
    - subject
    - priority
- 'category-description': Allows the user to set up a new email account, including
    creating a new email address and configuring account settings.
  'id': 24c2191df5ca4f6e9
  'category-name': Email Account Setup
  'entity':
  - 'attribute-description': The email service provider for the account being set up.
    'id': a7a32a0acc924fbd8
    'attribute-name': email_provider
    'attribute-similar-values':
    - Gmail
    - Outlook
    - Yahoo
    - iCloud
    - AOL
  - 'attribute-description': The user's full name as they would like it to appear in
      their email account.
    'id': 9a2064d3c87a46499
    'attribute-name': full_name
  - 'attribute-description': The desired email address for the new account.
    'id': e319140ec47844eb9
    'attribute-name': email_address
  - 'attribute-description': The user's chosen password for the email account.
    'id': 797ffcfc80684788b
    'attribute-name': password
    'attribute-similar-values':
    - SecurePassword123!
    - Email#1234
    - User001
    - Password1
- 'category-description': This intent involves taking measures to protect systems
    and data from ransomware attacks, which involve attackers encrypting data and
    demanding payment to restore access.
  'id': 8c7106eb19f84a229
  'category-name': Ransomware Prevention
  'entity':
  - 'attribute-description': The specific type of ransomware to prevent.
    'id': a27b6d9ce72a4d3cb
    'attribute-name': ransomware_type
  - 'attribute-description': The method used to prevent ransomware attacks.
    'id': 77cae5684def4aec9
    'attribute-name': prevention_method
  - 'attribute-description': The file extension used by the ransomware to encrypt files.
    'id': 9bc8116e2e0447af8
    'attribute-name': file_extension
    'attribute-similar-values':
    - .aes
    - .crypt
    - .locky
    - .zepto
    - .cerber
    - .cryptolocker
    - .wannacry
    - .gd
    - .encrypted
    - .ttt
- 'category-description': Allows the user to deactivate their email account, stopping
    all incoming and outgoing emails.
  'id': 3bb454d6d3284a45a
  'category-name': Email Account Deactivation
  'entity':
  - 'attribute-description': The email service provider where the account is to be deactivated.
    'id': a171e0c47a784f6d8
    'attribute-name': email_service_provider
  - 'attribute-description': The email address of the account to be deactivated.
    'id': 771ada07be314bceb
    'attribute-name': user_email_address
  - 'attribute-description': The password of the email account to be deactivated.
    'id': 32d833bbd58e4e508
    'attribute-name': password
    'attribute-similar-values':
    - any valid password
- 'category-description': This intent refers to the fraudulent practice of sending
    emails or messages that appear to be from reputable sources with the goal of obtaining
    personal sensitive information.
  'id': 880c8b1ad9194732a
  'category-name': Phishing Attacks
  'entity':
  - 'attribute-description': The specific type of phishing attack.
    'id': 9d425c07ebd943938
    'attribute-name': phishing_type
  - 'attribute-description': The target of the phishing attack.
    'id': 5026c6bfa7ba444b9
    'attribute-name': target
    'attribute-similar-values':
    - individual
    - organization
    - government
    - industry
  - 'attribute-description': The method used to deliver the phishing attack.
    'id': 34bf59afd6ca44c18
    'attribute-name': delivery_method
    'attribute-similar-values':
    - email
    - text message
    - social media
    - phone call
    - website
  - 'attribute-description': The social engineering tactic used in the phishing attack.
    'id': d975d343d47d41aa9
    'attribute-name': social_engineering_tactic
